uber-uns.title: About us
uber-uns.subtitle: More than 25 years of experience in professional building cleaning.

hero.alt: About us – O&I CLEAN group GmbH

sections.heading: Hotel cleaning
sections.body: Our company, Ö&I CLEAN group GmbH, has existed for over 25 years and is one of the leading building cleaning companies. In recent years we have expanded and now operate throughout Germany. Our main focus is hotel cleaning. We count numerous large hotel chains as well as private and commercial companies among our clients.

sections.heading: Employees & values
sections.body: We work with more than 2,000 employees who are flexible and have proven their reliability through their work over the years. As our customer, you will notice how important sustainable action is to us and that we keep the promises we make – this is what sets us apart from other companies.

sections.heading: Trust & passion
sections.body: Trust and appreciation towards our employees and of course towards our customers form the basic foundation of our company. A service provider with a well-coordinated team and passion – that is what we stand for.

qualitatsmanagement.title: Quality management
qualitatsmanagement.subtitle: For us, quality is more than a word – it is our commitment.

hero.alt: Quality management – O&I CLEAN group GmbH

sections.heading: Quality
sections.body: In a quality review, it is ensured that the customer’s desired requirements and wishes are actually met. The quality of a product or service is individual for every customer – it depends on the respective customer or company. At Ö&I CLEAN group GmbH we stand by our name: quality is our top priority.

mitarbeiter-schulungen.title: Employee trainings
mitarbeiter-schulungen.subtitle: Regular trainings and further education for social and technical skills.

hero.alt: Employee trainings – O&I CLEAN group GmbH

sections.heading: Overview
sections.body: Employee training in a company must take place on a regular basis. Employees are trained both in social competences and in technical fields – either from scratch or as a refresher. Trainings can take place in individual or group settings.

haufig-gestellte-fragen-faq.title: Frequently asked questions (FAQ)
haufig-gestellte-fragen-faq.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our cleaning services.

sections.heading: Why are basic cleanings important?
sections.body: Basic cleaning at regular intervals is important because dust and dirt accumulate even in the smallest corners of a room or property that are often not reached during daily cleaning.

sections.heading: What is maintenance cleaning?
sections.body: Maintenance cleaning covers all public and common areas.

sections.heading: How often should cleaning be carried out?
sections.body: Regular cleaning should ideally take place daily. Basic cleaning should be carried out at regular intervals.

sections.heading: Why should I rely on a specialist company?
sections.body: A specialist company has special cleaning methods, professional cleaning agents and, of course, the necessary experience.

datenschutzhinweise.title: Privacy notice
datenschutzhinweise.subtitle: The protection of your personal data is particularly important to us.

hero.alt: Privacy notice – O&I CLEAN group GmbH

sections.heading: Privacy principles
sections.body: The operators of these pages take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations and this privacy notice.

sections.heading: Data collection & use
sections.body: Using our website is generally possible without providing personal data. If personal data (for example name, address or email addresses) is collected on our pages, this is always done, as far as possible, on a voluntary basis. These data will not be passed on to third parties without your explicit consent.

sections.heading: Security of data transmission
sections.body: We would like to point out that data transmission on the Internet (for example when communicating by email) can have security gaps. Complete protection of data against access by third parties is not possible.
